mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appointment(a_cl_id, a_time, a_h_id, a_type_id, a_status, a_create_time) VALUES(#{aClId}, #{aTime}, #{aHId}, #{aTypeId}, #{aStatus}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.c_name AS cName, h.h_name AS hName, aty.at_type AS aType FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN customer c ON a.a_c_id = c.c_id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON a.a_h_id = h.h_id LEFT JOIN atype aty ON a.a_type_id = aty.at_id WHERE a.a_c_id = #{aCId} ORDER BY a.a_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointment WHERE a_c_id = #{aCId}

SELECT a.*, c.c_name AS cName, h.h_name AS hName, aty.at_type AS aType, c.c_id AS cId, cl.cl_id AS clId FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN clue cl ON cl.cl_id = a.a_cl_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.c_id=cl.cl_c_id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON a.a_h_id = h.h_id LEFT JOIN atype aty ON a.a_type_id = aty.at_id WHERE a.a_id = #{aId}
mapper.update: UPDATE appointment SET a_c_id = #{aCId}, a_time = #{aTime}, a_h_id = #{aHId}, a_type_id = #{aTypeId} WHERE a_id = #{aId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, h.h_name AS hName FROM appointment a INNER JOIN hospital h ON a.a_h_id=h.h_id WHERE a_cl_id = #{clId} ORDER BY a.a_time DESC limit 0,1
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE a_cl_id = #{clId} AND a_status = 0

SELECT a.a_time, a.a_id, at.at_type AS aType, cl.cl_project AS clProject, u.u_name AS uName, cl.cl_entry_fee AS clEntryFee, h.h_name AS hName, a.a_create_time FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN atype at ON a.a_type_id=at.at_id LEFT JOIN clue cl ON cl.cl_id=a.a_cl_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.c_id=cl.cl_c_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON cl.cl_u_id=u.u_id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON h.h_id=a_h_id WHERE cl.cl_id = #{clId} ORDER BY a.a_create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE appointment SET a_status = #{aStatus} WHERE a_id = #{aId}
